## During 2012-2016, Based on 2017-2019

[Appendix 2 to the User Guide for the 2017-2019 NSFG](https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/nsfg/nsfg_2017_2019_puf.htm) contains a table replicated as Table 1.

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.cap='**Table 1:** A table taken from page 2 of the Appendix 2 to the User Guide for the 2017-2019 NSFG.'}
knitr::include_graphics(file.path('img', '2017-2019_App2_table.png'))
```

Replication of these point estimates and these confidence intervals is done here to verify the analysis methods used throughout this repository.
